embeds.title: Staff Roles:
embeds.description:
These roles include all staff roles, including support and development. 
**Please use your judgement when pinging users with these roles.**

fields.value:
> <@&915025478652395542>
> Manages and creates content for the <@743183681182498906> bot.

> <@&915023582323699782>
> Handles moderation issues, both within the bot and this server. Contact support by reading <#917186322173669426>.

> <@&915023519711117332>
> Help with moderation of the Discord community. Common issues can be resolved by reading <#917242902491578449>

embeds.title: Miscellaneous Roles:
embeds.description: These roles include extra roles awarded to special individuals.

fields.value:
> <@&915036560259428433>
> Awarded (automagically!!) to users who have kindly nitro-boosted our server! Thank you!

> <@&915375109785669682>
> Assigned to users who have been accepted into the Beta Testing program. More info can be found here: <#916728057413394532>

> <@&915061304094515200>
> Assigned to users who own a verified bot. Can be obtained by creating a support ticket and requesting the role.

> <@&915061303431790672>
> Assigned to users who have posted a Youtube video (< 2 min) covering the wordPractice bot.  Create a support ticket to obtain this role.
> 
> **This role is assigned at the discretion of a moderator.**

> <@&920039641028100177>
> Rewarded to users who have **responsibly** found and report bugs on either canary or production instance. More info: <#921809154027454514>

embeds.title: wordPractice Bot Milestones:
embeds.description: > These roles are automatically assigned when you type `%roles`.
